author: jmannix
msg: Same clear() bug as previous checkin.

author: mahrwald
msg: ARIES-118 Enable multiple frameworks to work

author: jmannix
msg: Nasty little bug in the Open primitive map, only found by walking deep in the debugger: clear() wasn't clearing out the last entry in the values array, so if it was full, it stayed full after clear()!  This actaully caused infinite loops in certain conditions in other parts of the codebase.

author: jmannix
msg: Fixes MAHOUT-211, adding some consistent view semantics to matrices, and adding a shallow (view) constructor for DenseVector.
